duties_responsibilities.duty: Architect and build large-scale, distributed big data solutions using Informatica BDM and StreamSets.
Ingest data into Hadoop and ecosystems using Web-based big data ETL Tool StreamSets.
Lead and manage the development of Hadoop Ecosystem, including HDFS, Hive, Spark, Sqoop, Kafka, NiFi, and real-time streaming technologies.
Work with the Cloudera distribution and have experience in at least 2-3 Big Data implementation projects.
Possess strong analytical, technical, and troubleshooting skills, and must have excellent communication skills.
Lead teams and manage workloads for team members.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Data Engineering, or related field (Master's preferred)
